#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

bool Solve (int p, int q)
{
	if (p > 2 * q)
		return false;
	if (p == 1)
	{
		while (!(q & 1))
			q >>= 1;
		while (q)
		{
			if (!(q & 1))
				return false;
			q >>= 1;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		if (p & (p - 1))
			return false;
		if (q & (q + 1))
			return false;
	}
	return true;
}

int main ()
{
	int T, p, q;
	cin >> T;
	while (T--)
	{
		cin >> p >> q;
		int g = __gcd (p, q);
		p /= g;
		q /= g;
		if (Solve (p, q))
			cout << "YES" << endl;
		else
			cout << "NO" << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
